Docs.summary: Gets or sets the associated element's localizability attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the localizability attribute indicates that the element is not localizable, the <xref:System.Windows.Markup.Localizer.ElementLocalizability.FormattingTag%2A> value will be ignored.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If the value is an empty string, the element will not be formatted inline. Instead, the element will be represented by child placeholder in the parentâ€™s content.
